Response.Say: Our next meeting will be Sunday, July second from one thirty to three thirty PM. We will be at the The Episcopal Church of St. John the Evangelist, 1661 15th Street in San Francisco, near the 16th Street Mission bart. We will not be meeting the weekend of June twenty-fourth so members can attend Pride.
If you'd like to register or learn more, please leave a message with your phone number or email address at the tone.
